message.body: Hey Lizzy
Hello.
how are ya, dear?
O.o
Is this Andres?
ahahaha
no...
Interesting.
I'm fine, how are you?
aside from being completely distracted from doing things I should be doing, I am well
What sort of things should you be doing, and what is distracting you?
And why do you have Andres' phone/computer? >.>
rest assured, it is I. eh, I have a package to ship, for one
Welp, I'm confused.
it is monday =|
That sounds more like Andres.
you're welcome
Have you been drinking? -.-
quite the contrary. I'm completely sober, which may be the problem
ah
so there was something I wanted to clarify, for the sake of being...clear
Oh boy. Go ahead.
pfff
Ok, so the other day, I mentioned that I had been seeing a married woman
Right
about six weeks ago we ended it
k
we started seeing each other about a year ago or so, but it was very casual, seeing as she was separated but still married
there were a few times we 'talked' about where the relationship was going, but in the end we just werent that compatible and didnt see it leading to anything
k
I still dated other people
overall, it was a positive experience
Is that what you wanted to make clear? I'm starting to get confused again.
yeah, pretty much
You are so strange.
meh
I won't confirm nor deny
Besides the point that you'd already pretty much established all of those facts, why did I need that to be "cleared up"?
I just figured you should know, in case you were curious
I am literally shaking my head at you right now.
What was I just telling you the other day? lol
Need to know information.
about discussing other women?
You don't owe me, or anyone else, an explanation about your relationships.
I dunno, you said you like knowing things
I do.
But I pretty much knew all of those things already, haha.
oh, ok
I don't recall
I mean, you laid it out fairly clearly while we were talking about it
how nice of me
Your memory is even worse than mine -.-
for some reason I thought I might have left it a little vague
Even if you did, why would that be a bad thing?
it wouldn't necessarily, but if you were wondering about specific details then that could be annoying
basically I wanted you to know that there isn't/hasn't been anything going on with her for a while
Oh boy.

1) While I enjoy the openness and whatnot we have regarding relationship details/exploits, I promise I am not spending my free time thinking about the details of your past. My free time is usually spent thinking about hanging out with people or drinking beer or both.

2) This is exactly what I was talking about last week. We're not dating. What we're "doing", if you could even call it "doing" anything, is barely even casual dating. You are more than free to pursue whatever you want to outside of "this", and I'm not going to get upset about it. At all.
3) So, while I _do_ appreciate your concern and honesty, it really isn't necessary. And I'm concerned that your level of honesty/disclosure is, in general, not helping your dating situation.
As long as you're not hiding a significant other who's expecting you to be monogamous, and with whom you've agreed to be monogamous, you don't need to disclose anything.
while I generally concur, I do feel that at some point disclosure is, while not mandatory, somewhat necessary

but that is completely up to the individuals. Keep in mind, when I share it is indeed to put the other person at ease as much as I can. While I do know you somewhat, I think that I generally am going to react in a manner that assumes you think like other women
If we were dating, then yeah, I'd probably appreciate the clarification/assurance
But we're not.
and the main reason for my disclosure is due to the fact that I wanted to be clear that prior to us 'getting together' there were no other loose strings
so you don't need to expect weekly updates in terms of what I am doing in my dating life, and neither I from you
I don't expect anything like that, no. And I wouldn't offer anything like that anyway.
As we discussed, we're pretty much "friends" at this point, insofar as feelings go. I don't mind having friend-ish conversations with you.
it probably wouldnt have even come up if it hadnt been on my mind
I'm not going to get jealous or anything if you do talk about your dating life.
But yeah, I am definitely not holding you accountable for anything
Nor do I expect total disclosure
Or even partial disclosure.
Also, I don't mean to be offensive with any of this. I really think that you need to kick this oversharing habit, though. =P
due to the email I received from her that confirmed my belief that women will just ignore men rather than be honest with the fear or offending/hurting the guy
Men do the same thing =P
clearly, no me >.<
*not, would also have worked
lol
man, I need a drink
lol
Then your package will never get mailed.
but yes, I do agree, I tend to "overshare" sometimes
I definitely overshare a lot of things. And I don't know when to keep my mental tangents mental instead of verbal.
I've caught myself before, so it is something I am aware of
I honestly don't care about knowing the things. I just care that you seem to think I expect/need that information.
in the end, I don't think it's a huge problem. Not my problem anyway
Enh, depending on when you do that, it could be your problem.
not expect or need, maybe want or wonder about, but not overly concerned enough to ask
It COULD turn into my problem yes, depending on how it's interpreted
I consider it a red flag if guys start talking about exes/other attachments before we're actually getting _serious_ about dating.
oh?
Talking about exes makes it seem like you're still attached in some way, that the closure wasn't complete enough for whatever reason.
it's not considered just casual conversation?
ah
yeah, that happened to me once
Talking about other attachments or the lack there of makes it seem like you're rushing to the "serious" part.
hmmm
It _can_ be casual conversation. It's a matter of audience.
With me, as a friend? Fine, it's casual conversation.
yeah, see to me it's no biggie
as long as there isn't a lot of signing involved
It's generally not a problem for me either. I like objectively discussing pretty much anything.
But conversations during preliminary dating do not follow the same rules.
yeah I really don't mind it, depending on the situation of course
Just do me a favor and try not to talk about those things with people you're trying to legit date. =P
I won't be offended if a girl brings up an ex on a date, as long as the conversation doesn't continually steer in that direction
legit date?
why would I do that?
lol
and I love how it's doing YOU a favor
Because you're a romantic.
Well, you've already made it clear that you won't change your behavior to help yourself. I figured I'd try a different angle. ^_^
so when we went out, did I talk about my ex's?
We both probably did.
My issue with when we went out, which I believe I brought up before, was when you started talking about the other girl who just started messaging you again.
Because we weren't exclusive or anywhere near that.
So I was like "why is he telling me this, does he think things are more serious than they are?"

So, yeah. In conclusion, talking about exes isn't that big of a deal as long as you don't do it to the point that it suggests you're hung up on them. However, I strongly, _strongly_ urge you to stop disclosing other romantic/sexual pursuits.
honestly, I don't really understand what was happening at that point
and it's not something I would normally do
Okay, good. =P
I think I have the logs if you want to revisit them.
it may have been a subconscious way for me to display a lack of interest in you due to the fact that I was starting to get hung up on the other girl
Yeah
It worked, haha
but I didn't really have any desire to not talk to you anymore
I'm a genius
Enh, I don't know about that
My take-away was more along the lines of "This guy is clearly insane" not "this guy is trying to tell me he's not romantically interested in me"
sanity is overrated
To some extent.
but I will refrain from bringing up any current romantic interest per your request
If you want to talk about something, that's fine. Just don't bring it up as if you owe me the information.
It makes me worry that you think we're dating. =P
I have no problem discussing things with you, pretty much regardless of the content.
seems somewhat unnecessary though
/shrug
but yes, I don't mind talking about it either
If you don't value my input, then yeah, I guess it's completely unnecessary. ^_^
I do, but it just seems out of place
Why?
I like talking to you about dating and such in general terms, but to get into specifics seems out of place
Again, for me, it's more about how you phrase it than about the content.
and most of the dating I do these days seems to not really go anywhere
okkkk
so how would I phrase it correctly?
me: If you want to talk about something, that's fine. Just don't bring it up as if you owe me the information. It makes me worry that you think we're dating. =P
haha
yeah, I wouldn't worry to much about that. I may be romantic, but Im still a guy
Enh, I've lost too many friends because they decided to develop crushes on me.
It's annoying and I prefer to stifle it from the beginning rather than deal with the aftereffects. Hence, I tend to be overly aware of anything that could signal growing romantic attachment.
So I can crush it before it gets out of hand.
you're quite irresistible
and romantic
I'm going to go ahead and assume sarcasm there. ^_^
I actually am pretty disgustingly sentimental when I'm in a relationship. It's just that only a very few see that part of me. =P
Ill take your word for it
and it sounds like you're not too fond of that particular behavior
Of what behavior?
Being sentimental?
yes
Enh. When I fall, I fall hard.
I don't really mind what I do, just that I tend to pick bad people to do it for.
I seem to interpret selfishness as self-confidence/self-reliance, and I don't realize it until too late.
huh
so what do you interpret me as?
Ugh, that' hard.
+s

* Smart and off-beat, but perhaps a little too proud of both those traits. * Generous and caring but not particularly fond of being seen that way. At least not to the actual degree of those traits. * Likes keeping people at a distance/on their toes/guessing. Employs sarcasm and other verbal trickery/games to achieve that goal. Possibly/probably related to personal insecurities that I haven't delved into/considered at any length.
yeah, Im still trying to figure that out
I'd say you're pretty close
Any corrections you care to make?
* why not be proud of those traits?
Being proud of them is fine. Being _too_ proud of them is brushing against the line of egotistical.
* I don't mind being seen that way, but I don't want to be a martyr either
there are times I would agree with you about the ego
I think the interesting part about the second bullet is that you seem to intentionally try to 'cover it up'
but usually Im not being that serious. I can take a joke at my expense no problem
hmmm
maybe I don't like feeling like I'm being taken advantage of?
Right, and that's understandable
Do I seem like a generous/caring person?
no'
Right, you wouldn't assign those as primary traits of mine.
but you don't seem like you're not a generous/caring person
That said, I've offered friends significant amounts of money assistance to help them out of tight situations when I didn't have the money to do so.
I'm pretty sure no one would assume that I'd do such a thing just from knowing me

I have a 529 set up, that I regularly contribute to, for possible hypothetical children of my own, but the current benefactors are my brother and one of my friends from high school's kids, who I've seen twice.
So it's interesting to me that you _seem_ generous/caring, but then take steps _not to seem_ that way
you seem to associate kindness/generosity with $
Not so much.
More that I'm willing to take on responsibility/hardship to help my best friends when they need it.
And, unfortunately, I don't live near any of them for it to manifest itself in other ways.
That's the sucky part about moving all over the place =(
what about to complete strangers?
Yeah, and that's why no one would call me generous as a primary trait.
My sense of community is either very limited or easy for me to switch off.
well, as long as you don't wish them any particular harm
lol
No. I still can be generous, it's just not a priority of mine generally.
And I don't wish particular harm to anyone, as far as I know.
Maybe Chris Brown and Michael Vick.
But that's just because of the news coverage.
I.e., that I've heard them mentioned in the news recently.
in recent years I have learned to accept the imperfectness of humanity and not hold anything against individuals
to me that is, in a sense, kindness
I think that's kind of the New Testament approach, while I generally follow more of an Old Testament approach.
Wherein I see humanity as inherently flawed and pathetic, and so don't expect all that much from anyone. Meaning that negative behavior doesn't phase me much, but positive behavior is awe-inspiring.
Most days I just accept the world as it is and don't think about it much though.
there is a sense of superiority that goes along with a lot of it
do I feel superior to others? Yes, in a way I do
I feel superior, but I know that I'm no better than anyone else. /shrug
but only from the standpoint that I feel I have a better understanding, not that I am in some way superior to the rest of humanity
Right.
Higher levels of awareness/insight.
Still the same though.
and it is kind of a self-fulfilling prophecy
confidence does make you better in some ways. low self-esteem can be a hinderance
Is almost always
And I only qualify with "almost" because I'm almost incapable of stating anything definitively. =|
http://i.imgur.com/HuBXM.jpg ha
I don't either. In fact it's probably the only thing I do definitively
"depends on the situation" is my answer to any question
yep
I don't want it to be this time yet
I'm pro-4:30
Because it means I get to leave soon
understandable
so is there anything going on tonight?
Going to Victory for a little bit
you been there before?
Once
how was it?
Seemed nice. I only had a beer or two, then everyone else left.
So I wasn't there for too long.
huh. apparently you scared them away
Nah, company happy hour
Lots of people have shit to do on Friday nights
I actually don't most of the time.
oh?
you could have stayed
At Victory? I could have
I probably would have these days
I have more reason to talk to bar tenders
I generally assume that I'm not going to get picked up, based on previous experience, so there didn't seem to be a good reason to stay.
I generally don't drink by myself.
Unless it's a special beer that I've sought out
wait, what? are you trying to get picked up?
Not necessarily. But that's one of the reasons people hang around bars, right?
Can't say I know for sure, since I haven't ever really done that
umm, maybe. I know I don't
/shrug
I mean theres nothing wrong with it, but I don't really hit on women at bars
much
Some kid yelled at me on Saturday as I was driving, haha
huh?
I got a "How YOU doin", which I found hilariously anachronistic
yeah, that's pretty good
Made my day
so how long ago was it you went there before?
mmm, 2-3 months?
Maybe January
that wasn't very long ago
have you changed that much?
Yes/no.
I've gotten a lot deeper into craft beer in that time.
Have a purpose, with the whole blogging thing
and therefore sluttier
Don't be an ass. Have to go.
So, we ended up arm wrestling 3 rounds worth
Round 1 where we were, round 2 was switched seats, and round 3 was at a table instead of the bar
Because the bar put whoever was on the left (as oriented from behind the seats) at a disadvantage
I won rounds 2 & 3
I did have to fight for it a bit though
Nice
Were playing poker again...
Someone's washer or dryer is trying to take off
Into sace
space
Uneven load
Or modified for +5 awesomeness.
How many beers did you have?
Probably like 2.5
I bought the '03 Storm King (beer from the year I graduated high school =( )
Bought a 3-glass flight
So that could have been anywhere between 12-18 oz.
Then the kid who was hitting on me somehow managed to buy me a current Storm King
Which I shared with crazy chick
Who possibly had a better chance of getting me in bed just because of being more interesting. -.-
Somehow?
I revise my former assertion. I do get hit on, just not by guys who would survive my personality.
Yeah, we were talking about the beer, and then he ordered what I thought was just 'tastes' of the '12 SK
Slick...
1) I wasn't expecting him to order anything at all, 2) I was pretty sure he asked for tastes, not glasses
It was pretty smooth.
His game was pretty decent, but he needed just a little more
As it was, I thought he'd left
And then saw him on the way out
Which I felt really bad about
Because I was walking out with crazy chick
(And I mean that affectionately)
I think you'd have liked her
Possibly. Did you go home with her?
Nope
I'm not actually into girls as far as I know
She does have really nice eyes though
I'm a total sucker for light eyes, esp with dark hair
Yeah I'm a sucker for eyes myself
Man, I love this Young the Giant album
Well, like 4 of the songs, but I love those a lot
Who are you playing poker with?
Was. My friend and roomies. Sounds like I should have come to the bar after all
Meh
Could have. /shrug
The tipsyness is because I'm trying to get rid of the beer in my fridge, so I popped another one when I got home.
Two awesome chicks and one uninteresting boy. Like those odds. Kinda like camping this weekend
Oh really?
Sounds like an interesting story, do tell.
And aww you called me awesome. ^_^
Thank you. ^_^
HAPPY FACES EVERYWHERE ^_^
Alllll overrrr
I like baby carrots, I should eat them more often
Errywhere or All ovrrr
We need to drop letters to get the point across effectively
I don't know how exactly that works, but it's what the radios are teaching me
I don't even know what that means. So camping, yes
Aw the baby carrots are gone
Who went camping?
Four chicks, one other dude and myself. Slept in a tent with three girls. Don't know if I've ever done that before
haha
it was good times. I kinda dig the one girl
lives in baltimore though
That's not that far
Which girl? Have I met her?
eh, far enough
she was at the pig roast. shit, ive said too much
Mm, I don't think so
Did I meet her?
she's nice, but Im not actively pursuing her
she came with the baltimore crew, names rebeca
Also, unless you were intending to keep it secret, 'confessing' this works in your favor for me, lol
I don't think I met a Rebeca
and I hate the keyboard on my new laptop =|
Why?
its different
lol
That's no reason to hate something ^_^
wait, how does confessing work in my favor, for you?
ok, I cant type as fast because its new to me
Because it supports the "friends+" aspect of our relationship
on the plus side, it has a numeric pad
shesh, I cant keep up with this
lol
so now I AM suppose to talk to you about other chicks?
Are you trying to date me?
as long as it's not in a confessing nature
eh, not exactly
Then you can talk to me about other chicks.
=P
it's tricky. See, with my last lady friend, I still considered it "dating' to some extent
and I wouldnt talk to her about other women for the most part
Yeah, if we'd done the casual dating thing, perhaps it'd be different.
I think we're kind of going more "friends with benefits" route at this point.
and we werent friends before either
agreed
Okay, this song is making me feel weird
I can like...feel the music on my skin
its fine with me, I just need to know what your down with
Do not like.
sounds nice
It's weird
oh, I need to install spotify on this laptop
There's a bit of syncopation that's more discordant than my skin is really into, it seems... >.>
Tiredness + alcohol = what I imagine some drugs/highs are like
prolly
ugh, I hate having to get used to a new laptop. I know I shouldnt be complaining but I had my last one for over five years
lol
Get an external keyboard
Never have to learn something new again
fuck that, I dont need more complication in my life
I have my laptop (bought sometime last year) plugged into the monitor, mouse, and keyboard that I used for my desktop
Which is awesome
whats the point of having a laptop then?
I can unplug all that shit and take it wherever I want to at whim
3 plugs, with additional benefit of dual-screening whenever I want
yeah, I mean Ive done that before but I have like two other laptops so
Want to watch movies and chat with people while in my room? No prob.
dual screens are awesome
new laptop has hdmi output so thats another plus
Pretty sure mine does. But I have my XBox for Netflix, so I'd never even think of taking my laptop for that, lol
its a nice feature to have
and I dont have an xbox
ok, since I am apparently free to talk about other chicks....
lol
shoot
Did I ever tell you about the girl from jersey who I told had "approachable good looks"?
Yes
While we were in bed together lol
ok, well I wrote her an email about two weeks ago
the first time, obvs
Oh cool. How'd you feel about it?
thanks for clearing that up
Well, you were playing dead the second morning
So there was no talking =|
how did I feel about the email?
I was dead
yes
you were dead and you were playing dead. whatevs.
um, the same way I feel about most emails I write
k
Carry on with what you were going to say
fine. felt fine
well I didnt hear back from her
until the other day
and HOLY Shit
good/bad/otherwise?
apparently it made her cry
O.o
good/bad/otherwise? lol
yeah, Im that good
oh for fucks sake
lol
eh, good I guess
ok, the email was not like a "hey, remember me? we went out like a year ago. what are you doing tomorrow? yada yeda"
It was more of a, "hey so I just wanted to get some things off my chest, I think you're pretty terrific and will be a great wife/mother some day and I wish you the best of luck"
aw
yeah, It was pretty sweet, but I made it clear that I wasnt trying to re-kindle whatever it was we had in the past
I just felt like I had to be honest with her and let her know I thought she was a great person
Seriously, who does that?
Who cares what anyone else does/did/would think to do
Do you feel better for having done it?
anyway, so she writes me back and apparently she just got out of an 8 mo relationship
Yes, I do. I mean that's why I did it. I just felt it was the right thing to do. I honestly didnt expect her to write me back. Hell, I had forgotten all about it until I received her reply
What'd she have to say beyond the crying bit?
just that she remembered me, and really enjoyed our date and that it was very nice for me to say those things and she also wished me the best of luck
Sorry for the delays, btw. I'm drafting an outdated blog post on my tablet.
That was nice of her.
well, yes but kind of expected too
sure
its hard to explain with having read the emails, but the timing just seems odd. She said that my message came at a difficult time and she didnt know how to respond to it
What makes it strange for me is, on some level we have this incredible connection
and I just dont really understand it. Like what happened? Neither of us really pursued it very hard
whatevs
Yeah, I don't know.
Maybe she'd been also dating the guy who she ended up in a relationship with at the same time
And she thought that connection/match was better
Or maybe she didn't really feel the connection. Or she interpreted it differently.
quite possible, Hell I was seeing my lady friend at the time as well. I think I came off as somewhat unstable and not particularly interested in marriage/kids, which she was
I'm tired =(
So, even if you did have a connection, that probably would have prevented anything permanent from happening, right?
Unless you're talking short-term and she was thinking long-term
theres no such thing as permanent
it's just that silly, romantic side of me that asks the 'what if...' question
But if you don't want kids or committment and she does, than the what-if would pretty much end up in the same place
Albeit with, most likely, a bit more heartache and pain
yeah but no way to know
nah
Things like that don't generally change
there never is. I mean sure, most likely scenario, but if we always knew the outcome we'd never date
I mean, you're right insofar as the possibility of being an outlier
Have you watched TiMER?
It's on Netflix
Streamable
which I dont understand. whats with all these 30 y/o women and their dreams of marriage and children?
Can't say I have
I really wanted kids a few years ago
what around you doing for the Sunday/Monday of Memorial Day weekend?
I still do kind of want kids
But I feel "younger" than I did a few years ago, when I was in a committed relationship
I have no idea. I generally dont plan much around those holidays because its a PITFA to travel
Part of me really wants to have kids someday
same here, but Im ok with not
In previous iterations of my life plan, I'd have started having them around now
yeah, insane huh
And now?
Now I don't know.
pretty much where I always end up
I really don't know if I even want to be in a committed relationship any more
ditto
I might end up trying to do the single mom thing in a few years just because
Hard to say.
ugh
But I've felt those feelings
The maternal thing
It's not something you can just turn off
well, I'll knock you up if you want
O.o
I feel we have pretty good genes
Let's talk again in like 3-8 years. =|
I am not ready to have a child right now
Not by any stretch of the imagination
I would hate to deny the world our superior genes
haha
dont act like you havent thought it
I haven't thought about it specifically with you.
well, no
in generally I was referring
But yeah, I was thinking of getting myself knocked up, essentially
but how?
Seems the most efficient way of doing things
I mean, I know how but what guy, or any guy? seems dangerous
No, I don't just sleep with any guy
thats not what I meant
like, WOULD it have to be a specific guy or is that not that relevant
I was saying that I already 'pick' my partners pretty specifically
I don't have anyone particular in mind, but that's mostly because I don't intend to even consider that an option for a few years at this point
I guess what I am saying is, would this person be involved in your life in any way
I don't know.
It's not something that I've put an exceptional amount of thought into at this point lol
It's possible
Virtually anything is
I wish alcohol didn't make me more tactile.
It's rather annoying.
ha
Ive always rather enjoyed it
whatever you do, dont do ecstacy
I won't
I pretty much always bank against long-term losses for short-term pleasure
With the exceptions of alcohol and going out in the sun
I vaguely remember that picture being taken.
Mostly me being like "This prob looks 'bad', but what the fuck ever, I'm drunk."
"Also, cuddling"
yeah, you were all about it that night too :-o
Alternative predatory approach.
Like lions.
cuddling is good fun
we considered having a cuddle party at my place
Yeah, like 95% chance I wouldn't go to something like that, lol
I've very picky about physical contact most of the time
Took me until like 2 years ago before I finally started being okay with hugs goodbye
And a large part of that is probably just because I don't touch anyone normally
yeah, I recall our first date
lol
/shrug
I legit had you pinned for a few seconds, right? You weren't just playing?
Not saying that you couldn't have escaped/moved me regardless, but in terms of fairly nonviolent/nondamaging wrestling, I had you for a few seconds.
Ill give you that
lol
we were both holding back
True enough
Most of my self-defense stuff involves knees
Or elbows to faces
sure
I didn't think that would be appreciated
This album is entrancing
YTG?
y
this weekend?
huh, Im not that familiar with it. I know a few songs
Brian went to the show a few weeks ago
Yeah, I've been fairly ambivalent to it
But it's captivating me right now, haha
I'm going to a beer festival this Saturday
And have my class on Sunday >.<
scheduling that class on sunday was a fail
wasn't my choice
I couldn't do Thursdays b/c of grad school
So Sunday was my only other option
It ends sometime in June though, iirc
whats this beer fest?
http://mediadish.com/2012/04/brandywine-valley-craft-brewers-festival-2012-slated-for-may-19/
ah, looks good
you could always come after
yeah
this next party is looking to be a bit tamer than the last
what's the event? I don't recall seeing anything for this weekend
no pig or anything, just bbq, booze and fire
it's not official yet
and Lee won't be there, he's working
k, falling asleep. is bed time.
nighty night
Holy crap, that's awesome! I would've gone home with her if I was you
lol
I meant to ask her if she knew about CS, but other things kept coming up
wow, thats the second cs related message Ive received in the past ten minutes
To be fair, I sent it 15 minutes ago
right, the other message I got ten minutes ago
Listening to YTG
me too
I had no idea this album came out in 2010
Do you know what month?
eh, no
They've actually been together since 2004

On October 26, Roadrunner Records digitally released the eponymous Young the Giant album,[13] which Amazon.com hailed the third best rock album of 2010.[14] The album received a physical U.S. release on January 25, 2011.[15] The album was released in the UK on May 2.
Late 2010/Early 2011 seems right-ish
That's probably around when I started hearing My Body
that sounds about right
I find it strange that they are still touring
but I guess for a debut album it makes sense
